p: Molecular tests for arboviruses detection were made through Real-Time PCR. Dengue detection was made according to Huhtano et al. (2010) [ 31] and serotype determination was accessed using primers and probes serotype-specific described by Callahan et al. (2001) [ 32]. Zika RNA detection was done using the protocol developed by Lanciotti et al. (2008) [ 33] employing their second set of primers and probe (ZIKV-1086/1162c). Finally, chikungunya Real-Time PCR was also done using the protocol described by Cecilia et al. (2015) [ 34].
